name: Run! Bunny~绿绿小先生
detailed_description:
STORY

There are many small animals living in a coastal town, there was a peaceful life. But now, all is being controlled by baddy devil, and the town is full of danger and risky. You are a bunny name of Mr. Tiny Green, came out to find some carrots to eat and found the devil, decide to do something about it to restore peace.

GAMEPLAY

In a level-based gameplay loop, each level’s objective is the same: collect 3 carrots and back to the starting point.

In most cases, Only directional movement control is required. Just a few levels require some extra button. For example, the BOSS level of 15 levels needs to be taken on a boat with A button(Controller) or Space(Keyboard). A controller is recommended for precision maneuver over varios danger, Both joystick and D-pad have their own advantage in different circumstances. the joystick is more comfortable to control, and the D-pad is more precise. The keyboard uses WSAD key to move, and the game feel is between the two.

And,each level’s limitation is also the same: 5 lives and limited play time. But there’s checkpoints for each of you to make mistakes and be a little happy about failtures ＼(￣▽￣)／

FEATURES

  • Level-based Bullet Hell experience
  • Up to 30 levels (for now)
  • Support Xbox controller and keyboard
  • Two unique Boss battle. Beware o the final one
  • Cute animals, more carrots!

STORY

There are many small animals living in a coastal town, there was a peaceful life. But now, all is being controlled by baddy devil, and the town is full of danger and risky. You are a bunny name of Mr. Tiny Green, came out to find some carrots to eat and found the devil, decide to do something about it to restore peace.

For example, the BOSS level of 15 levels needs to be taken on a boat with A button(Controller) or Space(Keyboard). short_description: There are many small animals living in a coastal town, there was a peaceful life. But now, all is being controlled by baddy devil, and the town is full of danger and risky. You are a bunny name of Mr. Tiny Green, came out to find some carrots to eat and found the devil, decide to do something about it to restore peace.
reviews:
“一款兔子为主角的青蛙过河类游戏，难度很高，操作简单，支持手柄和键盘操作，每关有5条命，收集3个胡萝卜然后回到起点就可以过关。这兔子的关卡颇为凶残，两边都是电网不说还有各种蜜蜂攻击，奶牛践踏，吃个萝卜也是拼了命了……”
17173萤火虫

“这游戏意外的有意思. 休闲之余又不乏难度. 小推一波~”
百合腐女嫩妹子组

“This was an adorable and intense time! Though I worry the demo shows too much of the really tight spaces and timing challenges versus the open areas with movement challenges. Either way, it was an absolute blast!”
CoalFire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4210 1.7ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphic
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard soundcard or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: With Graphics Setting "Beautiful", Screen resolution 1920 x 1080, can run about 30 fps
